title: Wednesday Post Show (05-25-22)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (05-25-22)
description:
Bobby starts talking about Memorial Day and artist reading liners for it. Amy shares 4 things from the movie she filmed that Lunchbox is going to freak out about. Eddie brings a game to the show that he and his kids play. Bobby shares details on his upcoming TV show “Snake in the Grass” and what he can say about a season 2 of Breaking Bobby Bones.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
